name: John Smith
subject: Inquiry about Ladakh Package
message: Hi, I'm interested in the Ladakh adventure package for 2 people in May. Could you please provide more details about the itinerary and pricing?

name: Priya Sharma
subject: Group Booking for Golden Triangle
message: We are a group of 8 people planning to visit Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur in March. Please share group discount details and customization options.
response: Thank you for your inquiry. We have sent detailed group package information to your email.

name: Rajesh Kumar
subject: Feedback on Recent Goa Trip
message: Just returned from the Goa beach holiday package. The experience was fantastic! Special thanks to the tour guide. Would love to book another trip soon.
response: Thank you for the wonderful feedback! We're delighted you enjoyed your Goa trip. We'll be happy to help you plan your next adventure.
